channel.title: SAMSUNG SCH U450 apps, games, ringtones?
channel.description:
i just got this phone after getting rid of my LG, its not a long term phone, i usually go through a phone about for 3 months before breaking it.
well of with the boring story, i just wanted know if i can get any games,apps, ringtones or w/e for this phone for free any site. i did google it but came across few viral sites and alot load of crap.
the phone came with just ringtones, nothing more, no game, no nothing.
so if u guys know any can u tell me, thanks in advance. its SAMSUNG SCH U450

item.title: SAMSUNG SCH U450 apps, games, ringtones?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

go to http://zedge.net/ there you will find alot of stuff for ur phone but… you have to select ur phone in right corner up
